title: How do the NCT 127 members rank in vocal, dance, and rap? - Quora

response.answer_text: Objective Skill (I think, not 100% sure): Vocals (I think Taeil and Doyoung are close, but Taeil overall has more power and versatility, Jaehyun also has amazing technique, Jungwoo and Haechan convey emotions well, it’s harder to tell for Yuta and Johnny ’cause they don’t sing as much but I think they overall are good but have less control, Taeyong and Mark can pass as singers but they aren’t trained for it): Taeil>Doyoung>Jaehyun>Jungwoo=Haechan>Yuta=Johnny>Taeyong=Mark Rap (Mark and Taeyong are the two I most thought about, I do think Mark is slightly better, his flows and delivery are a little cleaner, harder to tell for the rest, but I think Johnny has the best objective delivery of the sub-rappers): Mark>Taeyong>>Johnny>Yuta=Jaehyun>Haechan>>Jungwoo=Taeil=Doyoung Dance (I cannot guarantee 100% this is accurate because I’m not a dancer, this is based on my research. All of them are good, but Taeyong and Mark are the most precise, smooth, strong, and emotive, then Yuta and Jaehyun, the next three each have different skills, I think Haechan’s really smooth, Jungwoo’s precise, and Johnny’s strong and has good endurance. The last two are the main vocals who aren’t bad but just are last because everyone else is so good, they are just less good relatively.) Taeyong>Mark>Yuta>Jaehyun>Haechan=Jungwoo=Johnny>>Doyoung=Taeil Personal preference based on style alone: Vocals: Doyoung>Jaehyun>Taeil>Yuta>Haechan=Jungwoo=Johnny>Taeyong>Mark Rap: Taeyong>Mark>Johnny>Yuta>Haechan (even tho he rarely raps I always enjoy it when he does)>Jaehyun>Taeil=Doyoung Dance: Taeyong>Yuta>Haechan>Jungwoo=Johnny>Mark (I love mark’s dancing, it’s just never struck me personally)>Doyoung>Taeil DISCLAIMER: NCT is such a well-rounded group that even the lowest people are amazing.I tried to be objective and thorough for the skill one, but I am bound to make mistakes.Personal preference is solely based on what stands out to me

I don’t think you can ever truly objectively rank them since music and art is such a subjective area, so I’m gonna ranked them based on my personal preference and what styles I value when I listen/watch kpop performances. I’m also adding their positions according to Kprofiles. VOCALS Taeil (main vocalist)Doyoung (main vocalist) (Doyoung and Taeil are pretty interchangeable depending on the concept and your preference)Jaehyun (main vocalist)Haechan (lead vocalist)Jungwoo (lead vocalist)Yuta: (sub vocalist) watch his White cover!!!! So good!!!Mark (sub vocalist)Taeyong (sub vocalist)Johnny (sub vocalist)RAP Mark (main rapper)Taeyong (main rapper)Johnny (sub rapper)Jaehyun (sub rapper)Yuta (sub rapper)HaechanJungwooDoyoungTaeilDANCE Taeyong (main dancer)Mark (main dancer)Haechan (lead dancer)Jaehyun (lead dancer)Jungwoo (lead dancer)Yuta (lead dancer)Johnny (lead dancer)DoyoungTaeilPersonally I would say I particularly like Jaehyun’s vocal tone, Mark’s rapping, and honestly Haechan’s dancing. xoxo
